full_summary:
### Canadian Grain Commission - Winnipeg

#### Tender Announcement

**Project Title**: Furniture Category 6 - Canadian Grain Commission, Winnipeg
**Contract Reference Number**: CB-698-50728014
**Solicitation Number**: 5K001-20231666

**Tender Details**

* **Bid Submission**: Email submission to bidreceiving-receptionsoumissions@grainscanada.gc.ca is mandatory. Bid documents must be attached to the email; links to bid documents will not be accepted.
* **Bid Deadline**: All bids must be received by December 21, 2023, at 16:00 EST.
* **Contract Period**: The contract will commence on December 21, 2023, and is expected to end on March 1, 2024.
* **Delivery Location**: 303 Main Street, Winnipeg, MB R3C 3G8, Canada

**Scope of Work**

The Canadian Grain Commission in Winnipeg is seeking a supplier to provide and install office furniture to their facility. The scope of work includes the procurement, delivery, and installation of freestanding furniture and office furniture installation or reconfiguration services. Please refer to the solicitation document for more information.

**Important Notes**

* This procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* International trade agreements do not apply to this procurement.
* There are no security requirements associated with this project.

**Bid Evaluation Criteria**

The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contracting Entity**

Contact:
Sheila Kvern
Email: [sheila.kvern@grainscanada.gc.ca](mailto:sheila.kvern@grainscanada.gc.ca)
Phone: 1-204-983-8302

**Tender Documents**

You can find the tender documents on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Please note that all bid submissions must be made through email. No other submission methods will be accepted. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the contracting authority listed above.  We thank all interested parties for their interest in this project. We look forward to receiving your bids. 2017-01-18
